pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhātuno saddhivihārikassa bhikkhuno sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.3: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.4: “ayaṃ, āvuso, āyasmā upanando sakyaputto mayhaṃ cīvaraṃ sāmaṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.5: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.7: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.8: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, upananda, bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.11: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.12: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:1.14: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.19: channaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ vikappanupagaṃ pacchimaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.21: dve vikappanā— sammukhāvikappanā ca parammukhāvikappanā ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.27: Tena vattabbo— “ko te mitto vā sandiṭṭho vā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.30: Tena vattabbo— “ahaṃ tesaṃ dammi, tesaṃ santakaṃ paribhuñja vā vissajjehi vā yathāpaccayaṃ vā karohī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.1.33: tassa vā adinnaṃ, tassa vā avissasanto paribhuñjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc59:2.2.4: Adhiṭṭheti vā vissajjeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
